SCTX - Script Source:
scriptname MQ01Script
; this script will handle all the "tutorial/help" messages in the CharGen dungeon

float timer					; gamemode timer
float menuTimer			; menumode timer
float fQuestDelayTime	; for quest script timing

short stage					; the stage to set when the timer runs out (gamemode)
short menustage			; the stage to set when the timer runs out (menumode)
short invstage				; inventory stage
short magicstage			; magic stage
short mapstage 			; quest/map stage

short tempstage			; temp variable

short tutorialOff			; set to 1 to turn off tutorial messages
short button					; message box handler

short heavyArmor			; set to 1 when player picks up heavy armor
short heavyArmorEquip	; set to 1 when player equips heavy armor

short lightArmor			; set to 1 when player picks up light armor
short lightArmorEquip	; set to 1 when player equips light armor

short weapon				; set to 1 when player picks up a weapon
short weaponEquip		; set to 1 when player equips a weapon

short bow					; set to 1 when player picks up a bow
short bowEquip			; set to 1 when player equips a bow

short arrows				; set to 1 when player picks up arrows
short arrowsEquip			; set to 1 when player equips arrows

short lootCorpse			; set to 1 when player loots a body (not Renault)

short nearBucket			; set to 1 if stage 56 text should display

begin gamemode
	; *****************************************
	; HANDLE turning tutorial off
	; *****************************************
	set button to getbuttonpressed
	if button == 1
		; turn off tutorial
		set tutorialOff to 1
	endif

	; ******************************************
	; Main Tutorial timer loop
	; ******************************************
	if timer > 0 
		set timer to timer - getsecondspassed
	endif

	if timer <= 0 && stage > 0
		if tutorialOff == 0
			if stage == 5
				enableplayercontrols
;			elseif stage == 10
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Use W and S to move forward and back. A and D to move side to side. The mouse turns you. Hold down SHIFT to run."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Use the left stick to move around. The right stick turns you."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 15 && weapon == 0
;				MessageBox "You need a weapon. Check near Captain Renault's body for her sword."
;			elseif stage == 16 && lootCorpse == 0
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "You may be able to find other useful items on the dead assassins. You can view the contents of any container (corpse, chest, etc.) by approaching it and pressing the spacebar when its name appears."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "You may be able to find other useful items on the dead assassins. You can view the contents of any container (corpse, chest, etc.) by approaching it and pressing A when its name appears."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 20
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Press TAB to bring up your journal. You can use this to view your character's attributes, equip armor and weapons, and choose spells."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Press B to bring up your journal. You can use this to view your character's attributes, equip armor and weapons, and choose spells."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 28
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Press F to draw your weapon or sheathe it. Click the left mouse button to swing your weapon. The right mouse button blocks."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Press X to draw your weapon or sheathe it. Pull the right trigger to swing your weapon. The left trigger blocks."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 34
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Now practice selecting and casting spells. Press TAB to bring up your journal again."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Now practice selecting and casting spells. Press B to bring up your journal again."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 40
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Press C to cast your selected spell."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Press the Right Bumper to cast your selected spell."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 42 && getstagedone mq01 24 == 0
;				MessageBox "There may be another way out here... check the east wall of the sunken room for loose blocks."
;			elseif stage == 50 && arrows == 0
;				MessageBox "Before you can use the bow, you'll need arrows. Check the skeleton to see what it contains."
;			elseif stage == 52 && bow == 0
;				MessageBox "Now that you have arrows, pick up the bow and practice using it."
;			elseif stage == 54 && ( bowEquip == 0 || arrowsEquip == 0 )
;				MessageBox "To use a bow, you'll need to have both the bow and some arrows equipped. Go into your inventory and equip them now."
			elseif stage == 56 && player.getdistance CGDungeon01To04Door < 1900
				set nearBucket to 1
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Now you're ready to practice with your bow. The bucket near the well will make a good target. Hold the left mouse button to draw and aim. Release the mouse button when you're ready to fire."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Now you're ready to practice with your bow. The bucket near the well will make a good target. Hold the Right Trigger to draw and aim. Release the Right Trigger when you're ready to fire."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 58
;				MessageBox "Nice shot! You can retrieve arrows from the world, as well as recovering some of the arrows you fire into enemies."
;			elseif stage == 72
;				MessageBox "Your Health is low and you are close to death. Increase it by drinking potions, casting heal spells, or sleeping."
;			elseif stage == 73
;				MessageBox "Your Magicka is low and you may not be able to cast spells. Magicka returns slowly on its own, or you can increase it by drinking potions or sleeping."
;			elseif stage == 74
;				MessageBox "Your Fatigue is low and you cannot do as much melee damage. Fatigue returns slowly on its own, especially while walking instead of running."
;			elseif stage == 76
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "You can hotkey items and spells from your journal by holding down a number key and then clicking the item you want in that slot. Pressing this number while exploring will equip that item instantly."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "You can hotkey items and spells from your journal by holding Y and pressing a direction on the D-pad. Pressing the D-pad while exploring will equip that item instantly."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 80
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "That goblin up ahead hasn't seen you yet. You may be able to sneak by him. To go into sneak mode, press CTRL."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "That goblin up ahead hasn't seen you yet. You may be able to sneak by him. To go into sneak mode, press the left stick down."
;				endif
;			elseif stage == 82
;				MessageBox "Notice that the crosshair changes to an 'eye' while you are sneaking. If the eye is dim, no one can detect you. As the eye gets brighter, you are closer to being detected."
			endif
		endif
		; remember what stage we were going to set
		set tempstage to stage
		; set stage to 0 so we don't repeat this stage
		set stage to 0
		; set the quest stage (which might set stage to something again)
		setstage MQ01 tempstage
	endif

	; ******************************************
	; Special situations
	; ******************************************

	; ** don't do further processing if tutorial is off **
	if tutorialOff == 1
		return
	endif
	
	; set variables when arrows are picked up and equipped (arrows can't be scripted)
	if arrows == 0 && player.getitemcount Arrow1Iron > 0 && getquestrunning charactergen == 1
		set arrows to 1
		if bow == 1
			; have both bow and arrows now
			set stage to 54
			set timer to 2
		else
			; have arrows only
			set MQ01.stage to 52
			set MQ01.timer to 2
		endif
	endif

	if arrowsEquip == 0 && player.getequipped Arrow1Iron == 1 && getquestrunning charactergen == 1
		set arrowsEquip to 1
		if bowEquip == 1
			set stage to 56
			set timer to 2
		endif
	endif

	; trigger health tutorial when player's health drops below 40
	if getstagedone mq01 72 == 0 && player.getav health < 40 && stage == 0
		set stage to 72
		set timer to 0
	endif
	; trigger magicka tutorial when player's magicka drops below 25
	if getstagedone mq01 73 == 0 && player.getav magicka < 25 && stage == 0
		set stage to 73
		set timer to 0
	endif

	; trigger fatigue tutorial when player's fatigue drops below 50
	if getstagedone mq01 74 == 0 && player.getav fatigue < 50 && stage == 0
		set stage to 74
		set timer to 0
	endif

	; trigger encumbrance tutorial when player's encumbrance gets above base encumbrance
	if getstagedone mq01 75 == 0 && player.getav encumbrance > player.getbaseav encumbrance && stage == 0
		set stage to 75
		set timer to 0
	endif



	; trigger hotkey tutorial when player approaches end of ImperialDungeon04
	if getstagedone mq01 76 == 0 && CGDoorFromRatsToGoblins.getdistance player < 1000 && stage == 0
		set stage to 76
	endif

	; trigger sneak tutorial when player sneaks after 80 is set
	if getstagedone mq01 80 == 1 && getstagedone mq01 82 == 0 && player.IsSneaking == 1 && stage != 82
		set stage to 82
		set timer to 1
	endif
end

begin menumode 1
	; ** don't do further processing if tutorial is off **
	if tutorialOff == 1
		return
	endif

	set button to getbuttonpressed
	if button == 1
		; turn off tutorial
		set tutorialOff to 1
	endif

	if menuTimer > 0 
		set menuTimer to menuTimer - getsecondspassed
	endif

	if menuTimer <= 0 && menustage > 0
;		if tutorialOff == 0
;			if menustage == 22 && MenuMode 1002 == 0 && weaponEquip == 0 && bowEquip == 0
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Click on the fist icon at the bottom of the journal to bring up the inventory tab. From here, you can equip armor and weapons by clicking on them."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Pull the Right or Left Trigger to change sections. From the items tab you can equip armor and weapons."
;				endif
;			elseif menustage == 36 && MenuMode 1022 == 0
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Click on the spell icon at the bottom of the journal to bring up the magic tab."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Select the spell icon at the bottom of the journal to bring up the magic tab."
;				endif
;			elseif menustage == 94 && MenuMode 1023 == 0
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Click on the compass at the bottom of the journal to bring up the quest and map tab."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Select the compass at the bottom of the journal to bring up the quest and map tab."
;				endif
;			endif
;		endif

		; remember what stage we were going to set
		set tempstage to menustage
		; set stage to 0 so we don't repeat this stage
		set menustage to 0
		; set the quest stage (which might set stage to something again)
		setstage MQ01 tempstage

	endif

	
end

begin menumode 1002	; inventory
	; ** don't do further processing if tutorial is off **
	if tutorialOff == 1
		return
	endif

	set button to getbuttonpressed
	if button == 1
		; turn off tutorial
		set tutorialOff to 1
	endif

	if menuTimer <= 0 && invstage > 0
;		if tutorialOff == 0
;			if invstage == 26
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Click on an item to equip it. Click again to unequip it. Shift-click to drop an item."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Press A to equip the item. Press A again to unequip it. X will drop items."
;				endif
;			elseif invstage == 60 && getstagedone mq01 60 == 0
;				MessageBox "There are two types of armor in the game: light and heavy. The leather armor you found on the skeleton is light."
;			elseif invstage == 62 && getstagedone mq01 62 == 0
;				MessageBox "Heavy armor provides better protection, but you can't move as fast. Light armor lets you move faster, but provides less protection."
;			endif
;		endif

		; remember what stage we were going to set
		set tempstage to invstage
		; set stage to 0 so we don't repeat this stage
		set invstage to 0
		; set the quest stage (which might set stage to something again)
		setstage MQ01 tempstage

	endif

	; SPECIAL SITUATIONS
	; trigger encumbrance tutorial when player's encumbrance gets above base encumbrance
	if getstagedone mq01 78 == 0 && player.getav encumbrance > player.getbaseav encumbrance && stage == 0
		set invstage to 78
		set menutimer to 0
	endif


	

end

;begin menumode 1022	; magic
;	set button to getbuttonpressed
;	if button == 1
;		; turn off tutorial
;		set tutorialOff to 1
;	endif

;	if menuTimer <= 0 && magicstage > 0
;		if tutorialOff == 0
;			if magicstage == 38
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "Click on the Flare spell to select it as your active magic, then hit TAB to exit the journal and try casting a spell."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "Select the Flare spell to select it as your active magic, then hit B to exit the journal and try casting a spell."
;				endif
;			endif
;		endif

;		; remember what stage we were going to set
;		set tempstage to magicstage 
;		; set stage to 0 so we don't repeat this stage
;		set magicstage to 0
;		; set the quest stage (which might set stage to something again)
;		setstage MQ01 tempstage
;
;	endif
;end

begin menumode 1023	; quest
	; ** don't do further processing if tutorial is off **
	if tutorialOff == 1
		return
	endif

	set button to getbuttonpressed
	if button == 1
		; turn off tutorial
		set tutorialOff to 1
	endif

	if menuTimer <= 0 && mapstage > 0
;		if tutorialOff == 0
;			if mapstage == 96
;				if isXbox == 0
;					MessageBox "This page displays all your active quests. Click on an active quest and hit the MAP button to display the world map showing your current quest target (if any). You can click on any icon on the map to travel directly to that location."
;				else	
;					MessageBox "This page displays all your active quests. Select an active quest and press X to display the world map showing your current quest target (if any). You can select any icon on the map to travel directly to that location."
;				endif
;			endif
;		endif

		; remember what stage we were going to set
		set tempstage to mapstage 
		; set stage to 0 so we don't repeat this stage
		set mapstage to 0
		; set the quest stage (which might set stage to something again)
		setstage MQ01 tempstage

	endif
end

begin menumode 1014 	; lockpicking
	if tutorialOff == 0
		if getstagedone MQ01 70 == 0
			setstage mq01 70
		endif
	endif

end

begin menumode 1030 ; class menu
	if tutorialOff == 0
		if getstagedone MQ01 84 == 0
			setstage mq01 84
		endif
	endif

end
